title: 98/242/EC: Commission Decision of 20 March 1998 recognising in principle the completeness of the dossiers submitted for detailed examination in view of the possible inclusion of cyhalofop-butyl, pyraflufen-ethyl and azafenidin in Annex I to Council Directive 91/414/EEC concerning the placing of plant-protection products on the market (Text with EEA relevance)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 20 March 1998 recognising in principle the completeness of the dossiers submitted for detailed examination in view of the possible inclusion of cyhalofop-butyl, pyraflufen-ethyl and azafenidin in Annex I to Council Directive 91/414/EEC concerning the placing of plant-protection products on the market (Text with EEA relevance) (98/242/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 20 March 1998.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ L 230, 19. 8. 1991, p. 1.
(2) OJ L 353, 24. 12. 1997, p. 26.
